markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wind-Tossed Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4352) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Rage of Elements](/Sources.aspx?ID=205) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=207)

**Prerequisites**
[Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4340); air is in your elemental philosophy

</column>

---

You enhance your spell with elemental air, using the wind to find your target and carry your magic around cover. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that requires a spell attack roll, you ignore the target's [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) condition and any [cover](/Rules.aspx?ID=459) they have from you. The spell gains the [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5) trait.
name: Wind-Tossed Spell
prerequisite: Elementalist Dedication; air is in your elemental philosophy
prerequisite_markdown: [Elementalist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=4340); air is in your elemental philosophy
